FjordLight

This package is designed to aid the user in accessing and working with the Arctic fjord PAR data product created for FACE-IT. An open access ESSD paper contains details on the creation of these data and provides examples of their use.

For a full range of examples for how to use this package, please see this vignette.

The package may be installed via CRAN using:

install.packages("FjordLight")

or via GitHub using:

remotes::install_github("FACE-IT-project/FjordLight")

Code of Conduct

Please note that the FjordLight project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
